item.title: AWS CloudTrail
item.description: Trails No IAM roles needed for cross-account delivery. #todo What principal does it show if you enable data events on the log delivery bucket? Lake Ingest events into an event data source, and run sql queries on this data source. Data can be collected from AWS (like CloudTrail events), custom application or 3rd parties (like okta system log) Pricing is based on data ingestion, analysis and retention. It can retain data up to a maximum of 10 years.

item.title: AWS Config
item.description: What is it? AWS Config records and saves configuration of supported resources. You can use these records to audit whether the resources align to best practices, or org specific patterns/rules. It can also highlight 2-way relationships between different resources. For ex - an instance is related to a vpc, a subnet, and a security group. This relation will show up in both the instance, and vpc records under relationships. Resource Schema https://github.
